description: A `TableCell` based component for placing inside `TableFooter` for pagination.

ActionsComponent.description:
The component used for displaying the actions.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

backIconButtonProps.description: Props applied to the back arrow [`IconButton`](/api/icon-button/) component.

backIconButtonText.description:
Text label for the back arrow icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

count.description:
The total number of rows.

To enable server side pagination for an unknown number of items, provide -1.

labelDisplayedRows.description:
Customize the displayed rows label.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

defaultValue.value:
({ from, to, count }) =>
`${from}-${to === -1 ? count : to} of ${count !== -1 ? count : `more than ${to}`}`

labelRowsPerPage.description:
Customize the rows per page label. Invoked with a `{ from, to, count, page }`
object.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

nextIconButtonProps.description: Props applied to the next arrow [`IconButton`](/api/icon-button/) element.

nextIconButtonText.description:
Text label for the next arrow icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

onChangePage.description: Callback fired when the page is changed.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

onChangeRowsPerPage.description: Callback fired when the number of rows per page is changed.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

type.name: chained

page.description: The zero-based index of the current page.

rowsPerPage.description: The number of rows per page.

rowsPerPageOptions.description:
Customizes the options of the rows per page select field. If less than two options are
available, no select field will be displayed.

SelectProps.description: Props applied to the rows per page [`Select`](/api/select/) element.

name: TablePagination

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.toolbar: Styles applied to the Toolbar component.
descriptions.spacer: Styles applied to the spacer element.
descriptions.caption: Styles applied to the caption Typography components if `variant="caption"`.
descriptions.selectRoot: Styles applied to the Select component root element.
descriptions.select: Styles applied to the Select component `select` class.
descriptions.selectIcon: Styles applied to the Select component `icon` class.
descriptions.menuItem: Styles applied to the MenuItem component.
descriptions.actions: Styles applied to the internal `TablePaginationActions` component.
